PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-15972000-10-170,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of COSTANZO M. GABRIELE, of Calgary, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
